text: "Radio" is a 2004 song by Robbie Williams and is the leading single from his compilation album Greatest Hits. It topped the single charts in the United Kingdom, Denmark and Scotland. It also made the top 10 in Spain, the Netherlands, Ireland, Norway, Italy, Germany, Austria, Hungary, Croatia and also went to number 12 in Australia. ==Track listings== UK CD1 and European CD single # "Radio" # "Radio" (Maloney mix) UK CD2 # "Radio" # "Northern Town" # "Radio" (Sam La More Jumpin' Radio mix) # Gallery and video clips UK DVD single # "Radio" (video) # "1974" (audio) # "Radio" (Massey mix audio) # Gallery and video clips Australian CD single # "Radio" # "Northern Town" # "Radio" (Sam La More Jumpin' Radio mix) ==References== Category:2004 songs Category:Electropop songs Category:Robbie Williams songs
title: Radio (Robbie Williams song)
